location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 1133/47 'Foreign Office print: Persian Frontiers (with map)'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 13; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a letter, reports, notes and maps regarding Persiaâ€™s frontiers. The Research Department of the Foreign Office produced a report, dated 31 January 1947, covering each frontier in turn. Two maps are included with the report.
